mapper.sql: id, title, description, content, pet_id, type, create_time,view_count
mapper.select: select article.*, tmp.label as type_name, p.name as pet_name, p.id as pet_id from article left join pet p on article.pet_id = p.id left join (select * from dict_detail where dict_id in (select id from dict where name ='article_type')) as tmp on article.type = tmp.value where article.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update article set view_count = view_count+1 where id = #{id}
